channel.title: A collection of things I find inspiring
channel.description: A collection of things I find inspiring

item.title: Hindenburg | Radio editing software
item.description:
Hindenburg | Radio editing software

It's all about the Story! Intuitive audio editing for storytellers. Hindenburg Journalist lets you concentrate on your story while we ensure audio quality.

item.title: What are some things that middle-class people believe that wealthier people do not?
item.description:
What are some things that middle-class people believe that wealthier people do not?

The middle class is obsessed with being labeled "The Middle Class." When polled on their social status, a majority of Americans answer that they are from "th...

item.title: Resume Tips: Top 12 Tips for Making Your Resume Standout
item.description:
Resume Tips: Top 12 Tips for Making Your Resume Standout

I don't care if your prose is sparkling or if you spend $2,000 on a professional resume writer. The goal of a resume is to be a marketing document that entices recruiters and hiring managers to feel compelled to meet you. Most hiring managers spend their days wading through resumes from qualified job seekers.

item.title: The Van-trepreneurs Helping Small Businesses Go Viral
item.description:
The Van-trepreneurs Helping Small Businesses Go Viral

Salt & Snow: What inspired you to start a company and hit the road to make videos for startups across the country? Erin Miller: The bus idea came from another group that has done the business bus life called Ponix and their bus is called the Blackbird bus.

item.title: Voice Actor Christian Lee Voice Over
item.description:
Voice Actor Christian Lee Voice Over

Voice Actor Christian Lee is a professional male Voice Actor for more than 15 years, specializing in Voice Overs for Commercials/TVCs, Promos, Documentaries and Corporate Videos.

item.title: Moore's Lore - Content & creativity, covered
item.description:
Moore's Lore - Content & creativity, covered

Creative entrepreneur Neal Moore is an an independent film producer, blogger and podcaster covering global content & creativity from Singapore.

item.title: Cover Letter Examples That Will Get You Noticed
item.description:
Cover Letter Examples That Will Get You Noticed

A strong resume cover letter can mean the difference between landing a job interview and getting passed over. Read and live by this comprehensive cover letter guide from our resume expert and professional resume writer Kimberly Sarmiento and check out her cover letter examples for inspiration.

item.title: TED Talk: Neuroscientist Shows What Fasting Does To Your Brain
item.description:
TED Talk: Neuroscientist Shows What Fasting Does To Your Brain

Mark Mattson is the Chief of the Laboratory of Neuroscience at the National Institute on Aging. He is also a professor of Neuroscience at The Johns Hopkins University, and one of the foremost researchers in the area of cellular and molecular mechanisms underlying multiple neurodegenerative disorders, like Parkinson's and Alzheimer's disease.

item.title: Thoughts on Gender and Radical Candor
item.description:
Thoughts on Gender and Radical Candor

This post is by Kim Scott (@kimballscott), Co-founder and CEO of Radical Candor, Inc., former Google and Apple exec, and advisor to Twitter, Dropbox, Shyp and others. Her first post on Radical Candor went viral last fall. Here, she looks at the topic from a new angle.

item.title: The Futurist: Promote the most important brand of all, your own
item.description:
The Futurist: Promote the most important brand of all, your own

For my parents' generation, career advice was relatively straightforward: get a high-paying job with a large stable company and you're pretty much set up for life. Even today, this is still considered conventional wisdom, especially in Asia where large conglomerates dominate several industries.
